attributes.action: The people of the UK feel betrayed by all politicians & demand a GE.
attributes.additional_details: I reference a number of elected MPs in the house from leave constituencies that time and again have ignored the will of their own electorates and that of the majority of UK citizens that voted to leave the EU.
attributes.background: The majority of politicians from all sides of the political spectrum  have not carried out the wishes of their constituents. They are not fit for purpose & the public demand a General Election to clear the house & install politicians that work in the public interest not their own.
